title: Garen might be the easiest, most brain dead champion in the game
body:
But i will be damned if he isnt incredibly _satisfying_


Running at some poor fool at 500 MS, Spin on his face and then smite him **FOR JUSTICE** while healing back to full health in 3 seconds late game always feels good.


https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/453131811002912768/QKtRDkQ9.jpeg
